name: .AQX
summary: Learn about .AQX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To use an AQX file with Psyberia AlpineQuest or All-in-One Offline Maps (Android), place the file in the app's ~/​datastore/​maps/​ directory. More detailed instructions can be found on each app's website.
You can also open an AQX file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform) or any other text editor, to view and edit the XML data it contains.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .aqx file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: AQX file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
